article.title: Travel and Tourism - Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn about the travel and tourism industry in Utah.
article.content:
​​

Utah Travel and Tourism

Welcome to Utah, paradise for outdoor enthusiasts! From National Parks to ski resorts and golf courses, beautiful Park City to historic Temple Square, sunny St. George to bustling Salt Lake City to tranquil Lake Powell, Utah will surprise you with its variety.

The purpose of the Commercial Service is to facilitate the expansion of yourUtah business into the global travel and tourism marketplace. The Commercial Service has many resources to help you expand your business globally! Weare able to providecurrent market research articles, arrangemeetings with international buyers, and help yourcompany through the exporting process.

For information and resources on attracting international visitors to your destination, please visit ourTravel & Tourism Industry Pageor e-mail:david.fiscus@trade.gov.​
